offers Package¶

offer_frames Module¶

class nzem.offers.offer_frames.EnergyOffer(offers)[source]¶

Bases: nzem.offers.offer_frames.Offer

Wrapper around an Energy Offer dataframe which provides a number of useful functions in assessing the Energy Offers. Is created by passing a pandas DataFrame in the standard WITS template and then modificiations are made from there

class nzem.offers.offer_frames.ILOffer(offers)[source]¶

Bases: nzem.offers.offer_frames.Offer

Wrapper around an IL Offer dataframe which provides a number of useful functions in assessing the Energy Offers. Is created by passing a pandas DataFrame in the standard WITS template and then modificiations are made from there

class nzem.offers.offer_frames.PLSROffer(offers)[source]¶

Bases: nzem.offers.offer_frames.Offer

Wrapper around an PLSR Offer dataframe which provides a number of useful functions in assessing the Energy Offers. Is created by passing a pandas DataFrame in the standard WITS template and then modificiations are made from there

merge_stacked_offers(il_offer)[source]¶
class nzem.offers.offer_frames.ReserveOffer(offers)[source]¶

Bases: nzem.offers.offer_frames.Offer

Container for mixed PLSR, IL and TWDSR Offers. Created by using the merge offers method of either the ILOffer or PLSROffer classes.
